meanings.definition: The first appearance of light in the sky before sunrise.
meanings.sent1: At dawn, the sky starts to brighten with the first light of day.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, I wake up at dawn to watch the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily as dawn broke, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent4: As dawn painted the sky with hues of pink and orange, the world seemed to awaken.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful stillness of dawn always fills me with hope and tranquility.

meanings.definition: The beginning or first signs of something.
meanings.sent1: The dawn of the internet age brought about rapid technological advancements.
meanings.sent2: With the dawn of a new era, changes in society became inevitable.
meanings.sent3: The dawn of a friendship can sometimes be awkward but exciting.
meanings.sent4: As the first notes of the symphony played, it felt like the dawn of a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The dawn of a new project always sparks creativity and enthusiasm in the team.
